sn35.60:1.4: Cakkhunca paticca rupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvinnanam. Tinnam sangati phasso.
sn35.60:1.6: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvinnanepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, vedanayapi nibbindati.
sn35.60:1.7: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimokkha ‘parinnatam me upadanan’ti pajanati.
sn35.60:1.12: mananca paticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovinnanam. Tinnam sangati phasso.
sn35.60:1.14: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manovinnanepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati, vedanayapi nibbindati.
sn35.60:1.15: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimokkha ‘parinnatam me upadanan’ti pajanati.
